name: core.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: DAppNode package responsible for manage the core packages
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

warnings.onInstall: **IMPORTANT!** This is a major update to OpenVPN: This update breaks compatibility with the last VPN version. Please read the migration guide at: https://migration020.dappnode.io . NOTE that the bottom right message updating the progress of the installation will never resolve. After the update you can still connect via WIFI if you have a physical DAppNode, and get your new VPN credentials from the devices section.
